data.title: Risen Son Village: Comprehensive Senior Living in IA
data.meta_description: Explore Risen Son Christian Village for a full life plan campus in IA. From independent living to memory care and rehab, enjoy a vibrant, faith-led senior community
data.text:
With beautiful views and a perfect location, Risen Son Christian Village is your choice for senior living in Council Bluffs, Iowa

We offer a full life plan campus with options ranging from complete independent apartments and townhomes to assisted support, memory care, short-term rehabilitation following an injury or hospital stay, long-term healthcare support and coordinated pharmacy services.

Here, you’ll find friends around every corner with bustling activities and social groups, an onsite wellness and fitness center, regular movie nights in our cozy theater, and spacious independent apartments with patios and decks perfect for entertaining. Our life plan difference means that when and if your healthcare needs change, we’ll be right here with you through personalized services.

Risen Son’s mission is rooted in our faith, meaning we have your best interests at the forefront, every step of the way. Our onsite pastors provide spiritual support, all-denomination services and more.

We’re perfectly located in eastern Council Bluffs, IA. Our campus has that small-town feeling but is within minutes to shopping, restaurants and healthcare providers.
